price: Dize: "Por certo, temo, se desobedecer a meu Senhor, o castigo de um formidável dia"
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ إِنۡ عَصَيۡتُ رَبِّي عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qul innī akhāfu in ʿaṣaytu rabbī ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
